ResourceHeader.ResourceName: GEOS-2 Direct Current Magnetic Field Component Level-2 (RFF)
ResourceHeader.Description: This data set contains the calibrated DC magnetic field from the GEOS-2 S-331 fluxgate magnetometer in VDH Coordinate System. Time resolution is 22.016s. The data format is RFF (Roproc File Format ftp://ftp.lpp.polytechnique.fr/robert/keep/Biblio_et_CV/Working_documents/2015_Robert_The_Roproc_File_Format_V2p3.pdf)

Parameter.Description: This warning indicates if there is any problem on the data : 0 no problem 1 the quality of all or some of the frames in the format is suspect 2 the telemetry format is missing and dumny data has been substituted

Parameter.Name: Spin Frequency
Parameter.Description: This dataset contains spin frequency given in Hz

Parameter.Name: Euler Angles
Parameter.Description: The Euler angles allow transition from rotating antennas frame into reference VDH frame. First component: precession Second: nutation Third: own rotation/gyration

Parameter.Name: Direction of Rotation
Parameter.Description: The direction of rotation of the probe. e : electron p : proton

Parameter.Name: Spin Phase Angle
Parameter.Description: The spin phase is given in the S/C system andS/C sens

Parameter.Name: Magnetic field components
Parameter.Description:
Magnetic field components given in VDH Coordinate System.
VDH frame (Vertical Dusk Horizontal system) The V-axis is the outwards local vertical, to the point of observation.The H-axis is parallel to the horizontal local plane, positive to the North.The V-H plane is a geographic meridian plane. The D-axis is azimuthal, eastwards.
